backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, mantra data, chant sessions, streaks, and access-controlled query methods with comparison utilities for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with confidence and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling theme, navigation, authentication gate, cloud sync, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper that manages login state, profile fetching, and conditional rendering of profile setup or protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter a display name and saving the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/chant/AudioContr: UI card for selecting background audio tracks, toggling playback, and adjusting volume.
frontend/src/components/chant/MalaCounte: Displays mala bead progress, triggering vibration and a completion banner every 108 counts.
frontend/src/components/chant/TargetProg: Shows progress toward a chant target with a progress bar and completion state.
frontend/src/components/chant/VoiceContr: Handles voice-based chanting recognition with start/stop controls and manual incrementing.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Histor: Groups and displays chanting history by date with counts per mantra.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Progre: Renders daily, weekly, or monthly aggregated chant counts as a simple bar graph.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Streak: Displays the user's current chanting streak and last active date.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header showing app branding, page navigation, and login state.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Mobile bottom navigation for switching between chant, dashboard, and settings pages.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineBa: Alerts the user when offline and notes that progress will sync later.
frontend/src/components/system/ReminderB: Shows a dismissible reminder message with a bell icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppState.ts: Manages persistent app state including mantra selection, audio settings, sessions, and daily totals, with helpers to update and merge session data.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Controls looping audio playback with track switching, volume changes, and play/pause/toggle functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudSync.ts: Syncs local chant sessions and daily totals with the cloud when logged in, and merges remote sessions into local state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useMantraCounting.ts: Counts occurrences of a mantra in speech transcripts, tracking matches and supporting manual increments and reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks online/offline status and periodically checks backend reachability via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, mantras, sessions, streaks, and daily totals via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminders.ts: Manages user-configurable morning and evening reminders with notification support and persistence.
Custom React hook wrapping browser speech recognition to capture transcripts, track listening state, and handle errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme with localStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark CSS variables for app theming.
frontend/src/lib/aggregation.ts: Utilities to aggregate daily, weekly, and monthly chant data and compute streaks.
frontend/src/lib/mantras.ts: Exports a list of supported mantras with names, descriptions, and languages.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Helpers for loading, saving, and removing JSON data in localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/textNormalize.ts: Normalizes text by lowercasing, removing punctuation, and collapsing whitespace.
frontend/src/lib/vibration.ts: Provides vibration helpers for success and mala completion haptic feedback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ChantPage.tsx: Chanting session page handling counting, audio, voice input, and saving sessions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing streaks, progress graphs, and chant history with offline awareness.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for mantra selection, targets, themes, reminders, and audio preferences.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to get, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session-based parameters, including hash-query parsing and persistence handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and typography, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the NaamJap Voice app, its features, architecture notes, and versioned state information.
